trans-unit.source: Converts <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> objects from one data type to another.
trans-unit.target: 将转换<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>到另一个类型从一个数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: A type converter is used to convert values between data types.
trans-unit.target: 类型转换器用于转换数据类型之间的值。

trans-unit.source: A type converter also supports property configuration at design time by providing text-to-value conversion or a list of values that users can select from.
trans-unit.target: 类型转换器还支持在设计时属性配置，通过提供文本值的转换或用户可以从选择的值的列表。

trans-unit.source: Access the FontConverter class through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 访问通过 FontConverter 类<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>类通过调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.FontConverter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新<xref href="System.Drawing.FontConverter"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: You should access a <xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter> object through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 你应访问<xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter>对象通过<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this converter can convert an object in the specified source type to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: 确定此转换器是否可以将指定的源类型的对象转换为转换器的本机类型。

trans-unit.source: A formatter context.
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序上下文。

trans-unit.source: This object can be used to get additional information about the environment this converter is being called from.
trans-unit.target: 此对象可用来获取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: This may be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，因此应始终对其进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object may also return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性也可能返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The type you want to convert from.
trans-unit.target: 你想要从转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can perform the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此对象能够执行转换。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此转换器是否可以将对象转换为使用上下文的指定的目标类型。

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context`参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是`null`，因此总是需要检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性可以返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_ITypeDescriptorContext" name="ITypeDescriptorContext" href=""></xref> object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_ITypeDescriptorContext" name="ITypeDescriptorContext" href=""> </xref>提供格式上下文的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object that represents the type you want to convert to.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>表示你想要将转换为的类型的对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该转换器能够执行转换; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的对象转换为转换器的本机类型。

trans-unit.source: A formatter context.
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序上下文。

trans-unit.source: This object can be used to get additional information about the environment this converter is being called from.
trans-unit.target: 此对象可用来获取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: This may be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，因此应始终对其进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object may also return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性也可能返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_CultureInfo" name="CultureInfo" href=""></xref> object that specifies the culture used to represent the font.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_CultureInfo" name="CultureInfo" href=""> </xref>对象，它指定用于表示字体的区域性。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: 被转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The conversion could not be performed.
trans-unit.target: 无法执行转换。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to another type.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的对象转换为另一种类型。

trans-unit.source: The most common type conversion is to and from a string type.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的类型转换为字符串类型。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation calls the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method of the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is string.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现调用<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>对象方法的对象是否有效且目标类型为字符串。</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: A formatter context.
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序上下文。

trans-unit.source: This object can be used to get additional information about the environment this converter is being called from.
trans-unit.target: 此对象可用来获取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: This may be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，因此应始终对其进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object may also return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性也可能返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that specifies the culture used to represent the object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，它指定用于表示对象的区域性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The data type to convert the object to.
trans-unit.target: 要转换到的对象的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: 被转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The conversion was not successful.
trans-unit.target: 转换未成功。

trans-unit.source: Creates an object of this type by using a specified set of property values for the object.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用一组指定的属性值的对象创建此类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: A type descriptor through which additional context can be provided.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过其提供其他上下文将类型描述符。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of new property values.
trans-unit.target: 新属性值的字典。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary contains a series of name-value pairs, one for each property returned from the <xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter.GetProperties*> method.
trans-unit.target: 字典包含一系列名称 / 值对，一个用于每个属性返回从<xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter.GetProperties*>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter.GetProperties*>

trans-unit.source: The newly created object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the object could not be created.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的对象，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果无法创建对象。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: CreateInstance useful for creating non-changeable objects that have changeable properties.
trans-unit.target: CreateInstance 可用于创建具有可更改属性的不可更改对象。

trans-unit.source: Allows the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontConverter"></xref> to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontConverter"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 允许<xref href="System.Drawing.FontConverter"></xref>尝试释放资源并执行其他清理操作之前<xref href="System.Drawing.FontConverter"></xref>通过垃圾回收回收。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether changing a value on this object should require a call to the <xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter.CreateInstance*> method to create a new value.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否更改此对象上的值是否需要调用<xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter.CreateInstance*>方法来创建新的值。</xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter.CreateInstance*>

trans-unit.source: A type descriptor through which additional context can be provided.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过其提供其他上下文将类型描述符。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_CreateInstance" name="CreateInstance" href=""></xref> object should be called when a change is made to one or more properties of this object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_CreateInstance" name="CreateInstance" href=""></xref>更改时对此对象的一个或多个属性; 否则为应调用对象<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the set of properties for this type.
trans-unit.target: 检索此类型的属性集。

trans-unit.source: By default, a type does not have any properties to return.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，类型不具有要返回的任何属性。

trans-unit.source: A type descriptor through which additional context can be provided.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过其提供其他上下文将类型描述符。

trans-unit.source: The value of the object to get the properties for.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的属性的对象的值。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Attribute> objects that describe the properties.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Attribute>描述的属性的对象。</xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: The set of properties that should be exposed for this data type.
trans-unit.target: 应为此数据类型公开的属性集。

trans-unit.source: If no properties should be exposed, this may return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果应公开任何属性，这可能会返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An easy implementation of this method can call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetProperties*> method for the correct data type.
trans-unit.target: 可以调用此方法的简单实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetProperties*>正确的数据类型的方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetProperties*>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this object supports properties.
trans-unit.target: 确定此对象是否支持属性。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A type descriptor through which additional context can be provided.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过其提供其他上下文将类型描述符。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the GetPropertiesSupported method should be called to find the properties of this object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> GetPropertiesSupported 方法应该调用来查找此对象的属性; 否则为如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
